categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Jordan Smythe was a man who served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic. In 3 ABY, he was stationed at Echo Base, the Alliance's headquarters on the gelid planet of Hoth, where he notably operated a hoverlift to move bales of ice fungus. Chase Wilsorr, who ran errands at Echo Base, was enamored with him.
